title: Darth Sion

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, you may choose to vent our your anger.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While venting, you will attack any and all visitors.
- You may only vent 4 times.
- Can perform the factional Sith kill
- Has private chat with the other Sith.
- Conversion Immune

desc:
Post 1292
*"And now you run in search of the Jedi. They are all dead, save one- and one broken Jedi cannot stop the darkness that is to come."*
